name: Epic Rush - Idle Pixel RPG
description:
Commander, congratulations on your appointment!

After the great war of antiquity, heroes destroyed the horde of monsters, and a long peace came.
But the long peace became poison, and even if the monsters rise again, we only could fall back!
Human, Orc, Dark Elf, Undead!
Recruit heroes from all races and build an army
Once again, please save this world with your strategy!

▶ Combine and Upgrade
- There is no complicated growth process! Merge growth that becomes stronger by combining easily!

▶ Auto-battler game with Autochess style
- Enjoy the Large scale battle with Easy one click.
This game combines Autochess and Large scale battles.

▶ Various races and classes
- Human, Orc, Dark Elf, Undead! Various classes of unique races!

▶ Enjoy as an IDLE
With an auto-battle feature, enjoy as an IDLE and be easy to stronger!

▷Human- "Maintain the battle line! Stop it with all your might!"
- The Human race has a barrier and is proud of its solid stamina.

▷Orc - "Ancestors are with us! Charge!"
- The Orc race specializes in critical strikes and provides powerful attacks.

▷ Dark Elf - "Show the savages a taste of mana!"
- The dark elf race can play flexibly with a fast mana supply.

▷ Undead - "Let's give the living the fear of the dead!"
- Undead races have tenacious vitality and unique gimmicks.
